T02D1298:190b-1: shr'i he badzra ba lim kra ma /
T02D1298:190b-3: dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i gtor ma'i rim pa /
T02D1298:190b-4: dpal ngag gi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1298:190b-5: thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid can //
T02D1298:190b-6: yi ge gnyis las yang dag 'byung //
T02D1298:190b-7: sku gsung thugs kyi dbang phyug gtso //
T02D1298:190b-8: he ru ka la phyag 'tshal te //
T02D1298:190b-9: sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ldan pa'i //
T02D1298:190b-10: dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor la //
T02D1298:190b-11: bdud rtsi gtor ma dbul ba yi //
T02D1298:190b-12: cho ga'i thabs kyi rim pa bshad //
T02D1298:190b-13: de la gtor ma'i dgos pa ni //
T02D1298:190b-14: dpal kye'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dang /
T02D1298:191a-2: sgrub pa'i dus su rnal 'byor pas phan gdags pa dang /
T02D1298:191a-4: rigs kyi bu dag tshe ring bar 'dod pa dang /
T02D1298:191a-5: yams dang nad med par 'dod pa dang /
T02D1298:191a-6: mu ge zhi bar 'dod pa dang /
T02D1298:191a-7: gnod pa zhi bar 'dod pa dang /
T02D1298:191a-8: dpal dang grags pa 'phel bar 'dod pa dang /
T02D1298:191a-9: dus ma yin par 'chi ba zlog par 'dod pa dang /
T02D1298:191a-10: longs spyod dang 'byor pa 'dod pa dang /
T02D1298:191a-11: phas kyi rgol ba bzlog par 'dod pa dang /
T02D1298:191a-12: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub
T02D1298:191a-13: thob par 'dod pa mkhas pas gtor ma'i las la
T02D1298:191a-14: brtson par bya'o // de yang gang zhig ce na gzhung las /
T02D1298:191a-15: bgegs rnams zhi bar bya ba dang /
T02D1298:191a-16: lha rnams 'go bar bya ba dang /
T02D1298:191a-17: dam tshig nyams pa bskang ba'i phyir //
T02D1298:191a-18: gtor ma'i las 'di ci nus brtsam //
T02D1298:191a-21: 'byung po kun la gtor ma 'di dag gis //
T02D1298:191a-22: rnal 'byor pa yis mchod pa legs byas nas //
T02D1298:191a-23: dus kun rnyed pas bde bar 'gyur ba dang //
T02D1298:191a-24: lha rnams dga' zhing 'gro ba 'byor bar 'gyur //
T02D1298:191a-25: 'byung po'i tshogs la gtor ma gcig sbyin na //
T02D1298:191a-26: sdang dang mngon spyod dgra yi sde 'joms shing //
T02D1298:191a-27: dgar dang gsad dang dgug par byed pa dang //
T02D1298:191a-28: zhi zhing bde dang rgyas par byed pa yin //
T02D1298:191a-30: yang slob dpon kha cig gis //
T02D1298:191a-32: dngos grub chog thams cad la //
T02D1298:191a-33: dpal ldan rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis //
T02D1298:191a-34: gtor ma'i las 'di shin tu bsngags //
T02D1298:191a-36: gtor ma'i las 'di shin tu phan yon che'o //
T02D1298:191a-37: de la 'dir ni sngags pas 'byung po nyi shu rtsa bzhi la gtor ma sbyin dgos te /
T02D1298:191a-38: lha chen brgyad po 'khor dang bcas //
T02D1298:191a-39: klu chen brgyad dang phyogs skyong brgyad //
T02D1298:191a-40: 'khor du gtogs pa'i brgyad po rnams //
T02D1298:191a-41: rang rang 'khor dang bcas rnams la //
T02D1298:191a-43: de bzhin lo gcig rgyun 'khor ram //
T02D1298:191a-44: zla ba yar ngo'i tshes bcu dang //
T02D1298:191a-45: mar ngo yi ni tshes bcu la //
T02D1298:191a-46: dkyil 'khor sbyin sreg bzlas pa dang //
T02D1298:191a-47: de bzhin gnod byung dus dag gam //
T02D1298:191a-48: ji ltar 'os shing rigs pa dang //
T02D1298:191a-49: rang gis ji ltar rjes mthun par //
T02D1298:191b-0: @191b ci 'byor pa yi yo byad kyis //
T02D1298:191b-1: nan tan du ni gtor ma sbyin //
T02D1298:191b-3: de la gtor ma'i g-yos kyang ji ltar zhe na /
T02D1298:191b-4: me tog bdug spos mar me byug pa dang //
T02D1298:191b-5: sman rnams dang ni dri dang lha bshos dang //
T02D1298:191b-6: tshod ma dag dang la du khur ba dang //
T02D1298:191b-7: zas dron dang ni drug cu par bcas dang /
T02D1298:191b-8: phye sogs byas pa bsres nas ni //
T02D1298:191b-9: 'bras chan 'bras kyi phyi nang 'bru bdun dang //
T02D1298:191b-10: zho dang 'bru mar 'o thug sogs pa bsre //
T02D1298:191b-11: khrag dang sha dang sran ma nya sha sogs //
T02D1298:191b-12: sbyar chang 'bru chang sna tshogs chan la sogs //
T02D1298:191b-13: btsos dang rjen dang rnying dang bcas pa rnams //
T02D1298:191b-14: ji bzhin bdud rtsi lnga dang bsres byas nas //
T02D1298:191b-15: de dag kun gyis snod rnams bkang nas su //
T02D1298:191b-16: bum pa chus bkang ba yi steng du gzhag / khur ba zan du mar me steng du bltam //
T02D1298:191b-17: mtshan mo'i dus su de dag la yang dbul //
T02D1298:191b-19: drag po la ni dgra bo'i gzugs brnyan steng du gzhag go //
T02D1298:191b-20: gtor ma kha dog las kyis bsgyur ro //
T02D1298:191b-21: de nas gtor ma byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa ni /
T02D1298:191b-22: de dang por bdag nyid lha'i sku phyag rgya chen por gsal bar bsgoms nas /
T02D1298:191b-23: thog ma nam mkha' lta bu la //
T02D1298:191b-24: yam las rlung gi dkyil 'khor yam gyis mtshan pa /
T02D1298:191b-25: ram las me'i dkyil 'khor ram gyis mtshan pa /
T02D1298:191b-26: de'i steng du aa las thod pa /
T02D1298:191b-27: de'i nang du nyi ma'i steng du h'um bhr'um a'am dzri'am kham dang go ku da ha na las /
T02D1298:191b-30: de'i steng du h'um las rdo rje aa las zla ba la phyed nub pa'o //
T02D1298:191b-31: de'i steng du aom gyis ye shes kyi bdud rtsi spyan drangs /
T02D1298:191b-33: h'um gyis ye shes kyi bdud rtsi dang /
T02D1298:191b-34: dam tshig gi bdud rtsi gnyis su med par bya'o //
T02D1298:191b-35: de ltar byin gyis brlabs nas mdun du gru gsum chos 'byung nang du padma sum brtsegs bsam ste /
T02D1298:191b-36: dang po padma dkar po'i dbus su dgyes pa'i rdo
T02D1298:191b-37: rje dkar po las lha brgyad aom las bskyed pas
T02D1298:191b-38: bskor / bar du padma sngon po'i dbus su dgyes
T02D1298:191b-39: pa'i rdo rje sngon po la h'um las bskyed pa'i
T02D1298:191b-40: phyogs skyong bcu sngon pos bskor /
T02D1298:191b-41: 'og tu padma dmar po'i dbus su dgyes pa'i rdo
T02D1298:191b-42: rje dmar po la aa las bskyed pa'i klu chen
T02D1298:192a-1: ba'i phyir rdo rje padma'i phyag rgya bcings te /
T02D1298:192a-2: aom ae aa ra li ho:/
T02D1298:192a-5: badza d'a ka d'a ki n'i /
T02D1298:192a-9: phem gsum brjod pa dang bcas pa las /
T02D1298:192a-10: snying ga'i sa bon 'od zer gyis bkug la /
T02D1298:192a-11: aom a'a: h'um lha brgyad 'khor dang bcas pa dang /
T02D1298:192a-12: phyogs skyong brgyad dang klu chen brgyad //
T02D1298:192a-13: bka' bzhin 'khor du gtogs pa rnams //
T02D1298:192a-14: dam tshig dgongs te gnas 'dir gshegs //
T02D1298:192a-15: gzhan yang gru gsum khongs gtogs pa'i //
T02D1298:192a-16: zhing skyong tshogs la 'di lta ste //
T02D1298:192a-17: aom shing gcig dang na dur khrod dang //
T02D1298:192a-18: ri bo dang ni ri sul phug / grong dang bzhi mdo zhing dang ni //
T02D1298:192a-19: khyad par du ni khang stong dang //
T02D1298:192a-20: gdol pa'i snod dang thang dang ni //
T02D1298:192a-21: khyad par du ni mtsho la gnas //
T02D1298:192a-22: ma mo yi ni gnas rnams nas //
T02D1298:192a-23: nag po drag po drag chen po //
T02D1298:192a-24: lha sbyin mnyam du bsten pa dang //
T02D1298:192a-25: nag po gtsigs dang mi sdug dang //
T02D1298:192a-27: rgan byed me dang drag mo dang //
T02D1298:192a-28: brjed byed ma dang au ma dang //
T02D1298:192a-29: rgyal dang rnam par rgyal ba dang //
T02D1298:192a-30: mi thub gzhan gyis mi thub ma //
T02D1298:192a-31: nag mo bzang mo nag chen mo //
T02D1298:192a-32: nag sbom ma dang rnal 'byor ma //
T02D1298:192a-33: dbang mo dang ni zla ba mo //
T02D1298:192a-34: drag mo sdang mo 'chang ba mo //
T02D1298:192a-35: 'phrog byed ma dang mar me mo //
T02D1298:192a-36: sum cu ma dang dbang mo dang //
T02D1298:192a-38: drag mo'i gzugs dang gzugs chen mo //
T02D1298:192a-39: mche ba gtsigs dang thod chen ma //
T02D1298:192a-40: thod phreng chen kha tv'am ma //
T02D1298:192a-41: sbrul chen ral gri dgra sta can //
T02D1298:192a-42: rdo rje de bzhin gzhu chen ma //
T02D1298:192a-43: de bzhin chen mo mkha' 'gro lnga //
T02D1298:192a-44: de bzhin rdo rje dbang phyug gtso //
T02D1298:192a-45: las kun rjes su sgrub byed ma //
T02D1298:192a-46: sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyal chen mo //
T02D1298:192a-47: de bzhin rdo rje dbang phyug gtso //
T02D1298:192a-48: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chen te //
T02D1298:192a-50: rdo rje dbang mo'i bka' 'di yis //
T02D1298:192a-51: thams cad ma lus 'dir 'dus shig / aom kakka dha na /
T02D1298:192a-53: khakhkha d'a na sarba dushta ni ha na ha na /
T02D1298:192a-56: he badzra mandala sa ba ri w'a re bhyo a'a karsha ya h'um dza:/
T02D1298:192b-0: zhes pas bkug la padma'i @192b gdan la bzhugs par bsams la /
T02D1298:192b-1: de nas mchod pas mchod de //
T02D1298:192b-2: aom ku ru ku ru aa dhi pa ti tishtha sa ma ya h'um dza:/
T02D1298:192b-4: de nas dam tshig gi lha la thim pa'i rjes su /
T02D1298:192b-5: lce padma'i steng du h'um las rdo rjer byin gyis brlab po //
T02D1298:192b-6: de nas padma'i lag pa kha phye ste /
T02D1298:192b-7: gtor ma la gtad nas gtor ma 'bul ba'i sngags brjod do //
T02D1298:192b-8: aom a'a: h'um: ho: badzra bhee ra b'a ya /
T02D1298:192b-11: sarba li ki ka lo kotta ra /
T02D1298:192b-12: sarba d'a ka d'a ki n'i shtsa bho /
T02D1298:192b-21: aa ti kam / sa pa ri w'a re bhyo /
T02D1298:192b-28: da da ma hi te dza /
T02D1298:192b-30: sa pa ri w'a re bho /
T02D1298:192b-32: grihnan tu dza: h'um bam ho:/
T02D1298:192b-34: sarba stv'a ni sh'antim ku ru /
T02D1298:192b-37: kurbandu h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1298:192b-38: ai dam ba lim kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi /
T02D1298:192b-41: badzra dha ro ta'a dzny'a pa ya ti sv'a h'a /
T02D1298:192b-58: sarba lo ki ka lo kotta ra /
T02D1298:192b-59: badzra d'a ka d'a ki ni sa pa ri w'a re bhyo //
T02D1298:192b-60: ai mam sarba p'u dza gandha /
T02D1298:192b-65: aaksha tam da da ma hi te tsam /
T02D1298:192b-66: aa gatty'a sa pa ri w'a re bhyo:/
T02D1298:192b-72: ma ma siddhi mme pre ya tstshantu /
T02D1298:192b-76: ma ma sarba kartya sad su kham /
T02D1298:192b-77: bi shuddha ye sa ha ka yi ka / bha bantu /
T02D1298:192b-79: badzra dha ro a'a dzny'a pa ya ti /
T02D1298:192b-110: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarbba dharm'a n'am a'adya nutpanna tv'a ta /
T02D1298:192b-111: aom a'a: h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1298:192b-112: de nas tshigs su bcad pa 'dis yang bsngo ba ni /
T02D1298:192b-113: aom lha chen brgyad po 'khor bcas dang //
T02D1298:193a-2: gnod sbyin tshogs rnams ma lus dang //
T02D1298:193a-3: srin po'i tshogs rnams ma lus dang //
T02D1298:193a-4: 'byung po'i tshogs rnams ma lus dang //
T02D1298:193a-5: yi dgas tshogs rnams ma lus dang //
T02D1298:193a-6: sha za'i tshogs rnams ma lus dang //
T02D1298:193a-7: smyo byed tshogs rnams ma lus dang //
T02D1298:193a-8: brjed byed tshogs rnams ma lus dang //
T02D1298:193a-9: mkha' 'gro'i tshogs rnams ma lus dang //
T02D1298:193a-10: de la sogs pa'i 'byung po'i tshogs //
T02D1298:193a-11: ma lus tshogs bcas ji snyed rnams //
T02D1298:193a-12: 'dir gshegs bdag la dgongs su gsol //
T02D1298:193a-13: mchod sbyin gtor ma 'di snoms la //
T02D1298:193a-14: bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba la //
T02D1298:193a-15: nang med tshe dang dbang phyug dang //
T02D1298:193a-16: dpal dang grags dang skal ba bzang //
T02D1298:193a-17: longs spyod rgya chen kun thob cing //
T02D1298:193a-18: zhi dang rgyas la sogs pa yi //
T02D1298:193a-19: las kyi dngos grub bdag la stsol //
T02D1298:193a-20: dam tshig can gyis bdag la srungs //
T02D1298:193a-21: dngos grub kun gyis bstod grogs mdzod //
T02D1298:193a-22: dus min 'chi dang nad rnams dang //
T02D1298:193a-23: gdon dang bgegs rnams zhi bar mdzod //
T02D1298:193a-24: rmi lam ngan dang mtshan ma ngan //
T02D1298:193a-25: bya byed ngan pa zhi bar mdzod //
T02D1298:193a-26: 'jig rten bde zhing lo legs dang //
T02D1298:193a-28: bde legs thams cad 'grub pa dang //
T02D1298:193a-29: yid la 'dod pa 'grub par shog / mkha' 'gro'i tshogs rnams ma lus kun //
T02D1298:193a-30: de la sogs pa'i gnod sbyin tshogs //
T02D1298:193a-31: drag cing gtum pa'i 'byung po'i tshogs //
T02D1298:193a-32: ma rungs sems can ming 'di long //
T02D1298:193a-33: dag cing snying rje med pa yi //
T02D1298:193a-34: rnal 'byor ma dang ma mo dang //
T02D1298:193a-35: mkha' 'gro gnod sbyin sha za dang //
T02D1298:193a-36: lto 'phye dang ni srin po dang //
T02D1298:193a-37: gzhan yang sha za khrag 'thung ba'i //
T02D1298:193a-38: khyi dang khra dang ki ka dang //
T02D1298:193a-39: 'ol ba bya rgod la sogs pa'i //
T02D1298:193a-40: gzugs can thams cad 'dir gshegs shig / bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba la //
T02D1298:193a-41: gnod par byed pa 'di zhes pa //
T02D1298:193a-42: chung ma nor dang srog dang ni //
T02D1298:193a-44: rang gi yul nas 'byung ba dang //
T02D1298:193a-45: dgar ba dang ni bskrad par bgyis //
T02D1298:193a-46: bdag gi dpung ni stobs med la //
T02D1298:193a-47: dgra ni stobs ldan kho na ste //
T02D1298:193a-48: 'di nyid khyod kyis bza' ba'i phyir //
T02D1298:193b-0: sha dang @193b khrag dang zhag dang rkang //
T02D1298:193b-1: bza' ba skom dang bcas pa mdzod //
T02D1298:193b-2: dgra lus gsol ba dgra mdangs phrogs //
T02D1298:193b-3: rang gi rnal 'byor ci rigs par //
T02D1298:193b-4: long la zab nyid du gyis //
T02D1298:193b-5: thams cad chim par bzhes su gsol //
T02D1298:193b-6: gang gis bdag la mi tshugs shing //
T02D1298:193b-7: dgra 'di thams cad tshoms par mdzod //
T02D1298:193b-8: bdag la las kyi dngos grub ni //
T02D1298:193b-9: rgya chen yongs su stsal nas kyang //
T02D1298:193b-10: nyid kyi gnas dang yul du gshegs //
T02D1298:193b-11: ci nus 'byor pa'i mchod pa 'di bzhes la //
T02D1298:193b-12: bdag gi las 'di 'bras bu mchis par mdzod //
T02D1298:193b-13: pus mo lha nga sa la btsugs nas ni //
T02D1298:193b-14: thal mo sbyar nas khyod la gsol ba ni //
T02D1298:193b-15: btsun mo dang ni sras dang g-yog tu bcas //
T02D1298:193b-16: gsan cing 'dir gshegs bdag la bka' drin skyobs //
T02D1298:193b-17: bdag gi bsod nams stobs dang ni //
T02D1298:193b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin rlabs dang //
T02D1298:193b-19: gsang sngags rig sngags mthu dag dang //
T02D1298:193b-20: chos kyi dbyings kyi stobs kyi mthus //
T02D1298:193b-21: sems can rnams la phan gdags pas //
T02D1298:193b-22: don rnams yang dag bsams pa kun //
T02D1298:193b-23: sems can khams ni ma lus par //
T02D1298:193b-24: de dag thams cad ci rigs par //
T02D1298:193b-25: thogs pa med par 'byung gyur cig / sngags pa
T02D1298:193b-26: gang zhig dgra bgegs tshar gcad par 'dod pa des
T02D1298:193b-27: / gzugs gtor ma'i steng du bzhag la /
T02D1298:193b-28: gnod sbyin ma la sogs pa mi sdug pa'i gzugs can /
T02D1298:193b-29: pho nya grangs med pas zos 'thungs par bsam zhing /
T02D1298:193b-30: gtor ma bstabs shing 'di skad las bcol lo //
T02D1298:193b-31: aom ma lus zhing na bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba dang /
T02D1298:193b-32: dpal chen khrag 'thung khro rgyal 'jigs byed tshogs //
T02D1298:193b-33: ye shes mkha' 'gro mkha' 'gro ma yi tshogs //
T02D1298:193b-34: dam can rgya mtsho ma lus dgongs su gsol //
T02D1298:193b-35: thugs rje chen pos 'gro ba'i don mdzad cing //
T02D1298:193b-36: gdul dka' drag po'i tshogs rnams 'dul ba'i phyir //
T02D1298:193b-37: sgyu ma lta bur cir yang ston mdzad pa //
T02D1298:193b-38: gtum chen rab rngam chogs la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1298:193b-39: snyigs ma lnga ldan bstan pa 'jig dus 'dis //
T02D1298:193b-40: bdud dang mu stegs log par lta ba rnams //
T02D1298:193b-41: zhi ba'i las kyis 'dul bar mi 'gyur bas //
T02D1298:193b-42: tsham ngam drag po'i phrin las myur du mdzod //
T02D1298:194a-0: @194a * // rgyal ba'i spyan sngar khas blangs shing //
T02D1298:194a-1: bstan pa bsrung bar zhal bzhes pa //
T02D1298:194a-2: 'jigs byed chen po'i bka' bzhin du //
T02D1298:194a-3: shin tu gdug pa 'dul mdzad pa'i //
T02D1298:194a-4: tshangs pa dbang phyug chen po dang //
T02D1298:194a-5: lha yi dbang po 'dod pa'i lha //
T02D1298:194a-6: khyab 'jug tshogs kyi bdag po dang //
T02D1298:194a-7: bhrim gi ri ti gzhon nu dang //
T02D1298:194a-8: dga' byed dbang phyug 'dod lha dang //
T02D1298:194a-9: nyi ma zla ba gza' chen dang //
T02D1298:194a-10: smin drug la sogs pa khyung gi mgo / mgyogs pa'i gshog pas gdengs ka byas //
T02D1298:194a-11: rdo rje sku yi dam tshig can //
T02D1298:194a-12: dkar po rtag pa'i dbu rgyan can //
T02D1298:194a-13: zhal gcig pa la phyag gnyis te //
T02D1298:194a-14: 'khor lo dang ni dril bus brel //
T02D1298:194a-15: rig ma dang ni mnyam du sbyor //
T02D1298:194a-16: 'jigs pa'i tshul gyis brkyang bskum gnas //
T02D1298:194a-17: phyag rgya drug gis lus la brgyan //
T02D1298:194a-18: dus mtha'i me chen klong dkyil na //
T02D1298:194a-19: h'um phat phem phem 'jigs par sgrogs //
T02D1298:194a-20: steng gi lha tshogs bcas pa yi //
T02D1298:194a-21: nam mkha'i ro zhon khyod kyis ni //
T02D1298:194a-22: dam tshig phrin las dus la bab //
T02D1298:194a-23: h'um he ru ka yi bka' bzhin du //
T02D1298:194a-25: ye shes dam tshig bdud rtsi dang //
T02D1298:194a-26: sna tshogs gtor ma 'di long la //
T02D1298:194a-27: bdag cag rnal 'byor sgrub pa po //
T02D1298:194a-28: rdo rje slob dpon slob ma dang //
T02D1298:194a-29: rdo rje spun dang ming sring la //
T02D1298:194a-30: gnod par byed pa'i dgra bgegs ni //
T02D1298:194a-31: sngags rgyud ye shes sun 'byin cing //
T02D1298:194a-32: slob dpon smod cing spun la 'khu //
T02D1298:194a-33: byang chub sems spong dam tshig nyams //
T02D1298:194a-34: zhi ba'i las kyis mi 'dul bas //
T02D1298:194a-35: gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams //
T02D1298:194a-36: rab tu drongs shig 'dir khug la //
T02D1298:194a-37: rdul dang thal ba bzhin du lhogs //
T02D1298:194a-38: mngon spyod phrin las dus la bab //
T02D1298:194a-39: sha dang khrag dang rus pa rol //
T02D1298:194a-40: rgyu ma glo snying nang grol drongs //
T02D1298:194a-41: sngon gyi dam las ma 'da' bar //
T02D1298:194a-42: bcol ba'i las rnams grub par mdzod //
T02D1298:194a-43: rgyal ba'i spyan sngar khas blangs shing //
T02D1298:194a-44: bstan pa bsrung bar zhal bzhes pa //
T02D1298:194a-45: 'jigs byed chen po'i bka' bzhin du //
T02D1298:194a-46: shin tu gdug pa 'dul mdzad pa'i //
T02D1298:194a-47: brgya byin gshin rje chu bdag dang //
T02D1298:194a-48: gnod sbyin dbang bdag me yi lha //
T02D1298:194a-49: srin po rlung lha la sogs pa //
T02D1298:194a-50: srin po'i mgo can 'jigs pa'i gzugs //
T02D1298:194b-0: mgyogs pa'i gshog pas gdengs @194b ka byas //
T02D1298:194b-1: rdo rje thugs kyi dam tshig can //
T02D1298:194b-2: nag po mi bskyod dbu rgyan ldan //
T02D1298:194b-3: zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa ste //
T02D1298:194b-4: rdo rje dang ni dril bus brel //
T02D1298:194b-5: rig ma dang ni mnyam du sbyor //
T02D1298:194b-6: 'jigs pa'i tshul gyis brkyang bskum gnas //
T02D1298:194b-7: phyag cu drug gis lus la brgyan //
T02D1298:194b-8: dus mtha'i me chen klong dkyil na //
T02D1298:194b-9: h'um phat phem phem 'jigs par sgrogs //
T02D1298:194b-10: bar gyi mi tshogs bcas pa yis //
T02D1298:194b-11: bar snang ro zhon khyod kyi ni //
T02D1298:194b-12: dam tshig phrin las dus la bab //
T02D1298:194b-13: h'um he ru ka yi bka' bzhin du //
T02D1298:194b-15: ye shes dam tshig bdud rtsi dang //
T02D1298:194b-16: sna tshogs gtor ma 'di long la //
T02D1298:194b-17: bdag cag rnal 'byor sgrub pa po //
T02D1298:194b-18: rdo rje slob dpon slob ma dang //
T02D1298:194b-19: rdo rje spun dang ming sring la //
T02D1298:194b-20: gnod par byed pa'i dgra bgegs ni //
T02D1298:194b-21: sngags rgyud ye shes sun 'byin cing //
T02D1298:194b-22: slob dpon slod cing spun la 'khu //
T02D1298:194b-23: byang chub sems spong dam tshig nyams //
T02D1298:194b-24: zhi ba'i las kyis mi 'dul bas //
T02D1298:194b-25: gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams //
T02D1298:194b-26: rab tu drongs shig 'dir khug la //
T02D1298:194b-27: rdul dang thal ba bzhin du lhogs //
T02D1298:194b-28: mngon spyod phrin las dus la bab //
T02D1298:194b-29: sha dang khrag dang rus par rol //
T02D1298:194b-30: rgyu ma glo snying nang grol drongs //
T02D1298:194b-31: sngon gyi dam las ma 'da' bar //
T02D1298:194b-32: bcol ba'i las rnams grub par mdzod //
T02D1298:194b-33: rgyal ba'i spyan sngar khas blangs shing //
T02D1298:194b-34: bstan pa bsrung bar zhal ba zhes pa //
T02D1298:194b-35: 'jigs byed chen po'i bka' bzhin du //
T02D1298:194b-36: shin tu gdug pa 'dul mdzad pa //
T02D1298:194b-37: stobs rgyu dung skyong mtha' yas dang //
T02D1298:194b-38: nor rgyas bu dang 'jog po dang //
T02D1298:194b-39: rigs ldan padma chen po dang //
T02D1298:194b-40: padma la sogs chu srin mgo / mgyogs pa'i gshog pas gdengs ka byas //
T02D1298:194b-41: rdo rje gsung gi dam tshig can //
T02D1298:194b-42: dmar po gar dbang dbu rgyan ldan //
T02D1298:194b-43: zhal gcig pa la phyag gnyis te //
T02D1298:194b-44: padma dang ni dril bus brel //
T02D1298:194b-45: rig ma dang ni mnyam du sbyor //
T02D1298:194b-46: 'jigs pa'i tshul gyis brkyang bskum gnas //
T02D1298:194b-47: phyag rgya drug gis lus la brgyan //
T02D1298:194b-48: dus mtha'i me chen klong dkyil na //
T02D1298:194b-49: h'um phat phem phem 'jigs par sgrogs //
T02D1298:194b-50: 'og gi klu tshogs bcas pa yis //
T02D1298:194b-51: sa 'og ro zhon khyod kyi ni //
T02D1298:194b-52: dam tshig thugs dam dus la bab //
T02D1298:194b-53: h'um he ru ka yi bka' bzhin du //
T02D1298:195a-1: ye shes dam tshig bdud rtsi dang //
T02D1298:195a-2: sna tshogs gtor ma 'di long la //
T02D1298:195a-3: bdag cag rnal 'byor sgrub pa po //
T02D1298:195a-4: rdo rje slob dpon slob mar bcas //
T02D1298:195a-5: rdo rje spun dang ming sring la //
T02D1298:195a-6: gnod par byed pa'i dgra bgegs ni //
T02D1298:195a-7: sngags rgyud ye shes sun 'byin cing //
T02D1298:195a-8: slob dpon smod cing spun la 'khu //
T02D1298:195a-9: byang chub sems spong dam tshig nyams //
T02D1298:195a-10: zhi ba'i las kyis mi 'dul bas //
T02D1298:195a-11: gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams //
T02D1298:195a-12: rab tu drongs shig 'dir khug la //
T02D1298:195a-13: rdul dang thal ba bzhin du lhogs //
T02D1298:195a-14: mngon spyod phrin las dus la bab //
T02D1298:195a-15: sha dang khrag dang rus pa rol //
T02D1298:195a-16: rgyu ma glo snying nang grol drongs //
T02D1298:195a-17: sngon gyi dam las ma 'da' bar //
T02D1298:195a-18: bcol ba'i las rnams grub par mdzod //
T02D1298:195a-19: rgyal ba'i spyan sngar khas blangs shing //
T02D1298:195a-20: bstan pa bsrung bar zhal bzhes pa //
T02D1298:195a-21: 'jigs byed chen po'i bka' bzhin du //
T02D1298:195a-22: shin tu gdug pa 'dul mdzad pa //
T02D1298:195a-23: phyi rol dur khrod 'jigs pa na //
T02D1298:195a-24: dpa' bo dpa' mo rnal 'byor tshogs //
T02D1298:195a-25: zhing skyong drag po ro langs dang //
T02D1298:195a-26: ma mo mkha' 'gro la sogs pa tshogs //
T02D1298:195a-27: sha za brjed byed srul po dang //
T02D1298:195a-28: nam gru log 'dren la sogs pa //
T02D1298:195a-29: gnod sbyin sa bdag gdug pa'i 'dre //
T02D1298:195a-30: la la srin po'i zhal can la //
T02D1298:195a-31: mi yi lus can 'jigs pa'i gzugs //
T02D1298:195a-32: la la stag gi mgo can la //
T02D1298:195a-33: mi yi lus can rngam pa'i gzugs //
T02D1298:195a-34: la la seng ge'i mgo can la //
T02D1298:195a-35: srin po'i gzugs can shin tu khro //
T02D1298:195a-36: la la mkha' lding mgo can la //
T02D1298:195a-37: klu yi lus can 'jigs pa'i gzugs //
T02D1298:195a-38: de bzhin bya yi mgo can dang //
T02D1298:195a-39: gcan gzan lus can sna tshogs rnams //
T02D1298:195a-40: la la khro zhing la la rngam //
T02D1298:195a-41: la la zhi zhing la la gtum //
T02D1298:195a-42: la la 'gying zhing la la lding //
T02D1298:195a-43: la la sha za khrag 'thung brtson //
T02D1298:195a-44: la la khro gtum 'jigs pa'i gzugs //
T02D1298:195a-45: la la rab brtson khro gnyer can //
T02D1298:195a-46: la la bzhad gad ha ha sgrog / la la 'brug skad bzhin du ldir //
T02D1298:195a-47: la la rngam skad phem phem sgrogs //
T02D1298:195a-48: la la mkha' stong gar gyis 'gengs //
T02D1298:195a-49: la la rtsub cing la la gnag / la la dkar zhing rnam par gsal //
T02D1298:195b-0: la la dmar zhing chags pa'i @195b mdog / la la sngo zhing sdang ba'i tshul //
T02D1298:195b-1: la la ser po dbyibs mdog rgyas //
T02D1298:195b-2: la la khro gnyer smin bu rtsub //
T02D1298:195b-3: la la smin bu gyen du 'khyil //
T02D1298:195b-4: skra 'khyil nam mkha'i dbyings su khyab //
T02D1298:195b-5: zhal gdangs mche gtsigs khrag 'thung ba'i //
T02D1298:195b-6: ljags dril mche ba dmar po gtsigs //
T02D1298:195b-7: spyan gsum sdang mig khro gnyer can //
T02D1298:195b-8: rus pa'i bstar phreng sprul gyis brgyan //
T02D1298:195b-9: khrag zhag tshig gi tshom bus brgyan //
T02D1298:195b-10: glang chen klo rlon rnam par shal //
T02D1298:195b-11: stag gi pags pas sham thabs byas //
T02D1298:195b-12: na bza' mi yi lpags rlon gsol //
T02D1298:195b-13: la la rdo rje gtun shing dang //
T02D1298:195b-14: ral gri chu gri la sogs pa'i //
T02D1298:195b-15: lag na mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin //
T02D1298:195b-16: la la gar gyi phyag rgyas sbyor //
T02D1298:195b-18: phyi rol 'byung po'i tshogs bcas rnams //
T02D1298:195b-19: sa steng sa ro zhon thams cad kyi //
T02D1298:195b-20: dam tshig phrin las dus la bab //
T02D1298:195b-21: h'um he ru ka yi bka' bzhin du //
T02D1298:195b-23: ye shes dam tshig bdud rtsi dang //
T02D1298:195b-24: sna tshogs gtor ma 'di long la //
T02D1298:195b-25: bdag cag rnal 'byor sgrub pa po //
T02D1298:195b-26: rdo rje slob dpon slob ma dang //
T02D1298:195b-27: rdo rje spun dang ming sring la //
T02D1298:195b-28: gnod par byed pa'i dgra bgegs ni //
T02D1298:195b-29: sngags rgyud ye shes sun 'byin cing //
T02D1298:195b-30: slob dpon smod cing spun la 'khu //
T02D1298:195b-31: byang chub sems spong dam tshig nyams //
T02D1298:195b-32: zhi ba'i las kyis mi 'dul bas //
T02D1298:195b-33: gdug pa'i sdang sems ldan pa rnams //
T02D1298:195b-34: rab tu drongs shig 'dir khug la //
T02D1298:195b-35: rdul dang thal ba bzhin du lhogs //
T02D1298:195b-36: mngon spyod phrin las dus la bab //
T02D1298:195b-37: sha dang khrag dang rus la rol //
T02D1298:195b-38: rgyu ma glo snying nang grol drongs //
T02D1298:195b-39: sngon gyi dam las ma 'da' bar //
T02D1298:195b-40: bcol ba'i las rnams grub par mdzod //
T02D1298:195b-41: de nas gsad pa'i las bzhi bya /
T02D1298:195b-42: de nas rdo rje'i glu brjod /
T02D1298:195b-44: aom chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste //
T02D1298:195b-45: dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med //
T02D1298:195b-46: rgyu dang las las kun du 'byung //
T02D1298:195b-47: de bzhin nyid las nges par skyes //
T02D1298:195b-49: kun gyis dri ma med mthong shog / sems can
T02D1298:195b-50: thams cad bde gyur cig / gang gi lam nas
T02D1298:195b-51: 'gro ba der // sangs rgyas nyid dang phrad par shog / de nas smon lam gdab pa ni //
T02D1298:196a-1: tsandan le pe tam aa gangdya nam pra bha ra na /
T02D1298:196a-2: po tam ka ku mu mi k'i ra nam bi ha ra tam /
T02D1298:196a-4: pu na r'a ga ma na ya mu:/
T02D1298:196a-5: aom badzra sa tva sa ma ya /
T02D1298:196a-7: badzra sa tva tve no pa tishtha /
T02D1298:196a-9: su to shyo me bha ba /
T02D1298:196a-10: aa nu rakto me bha ba /
T02D1298:196a-13: sarba ka rma su tstsha me /
T02D1298:196a-16: ha ha ha ha ho: bha ga b'an /
T02D1298:196a-17: sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra m'a me munytsa /
T02D1298:196a-18: badzr'i bha ba ma h'a sa ma ya sa tva a'a:/
T02D1298:196a-20: aom khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad //
T02D1298:196a-21: rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol //
T02D1298:196a-22: sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang //
T02D1298:196a-23: slar yang 'byon par mdzad du gsol //
T02D1298:196a-24: zhes pas rang bzhin gyi mgron gshegs su gsol lo //
T02D1298:196a-25: dam tshig gi mgron yi ge gsum du byas nas bdag gi snying ga'i sa bon la bsdu'o //
T02D1298:196a-26: rnal 'byor pa yi ser sna dang //
T02D1298:196a-27: dbul ba'i dri ma sbyang ba dang //
T02D1298:196a-28: dngos grub myur du thob pa dang //
T02D1298:196a-30: dag bas 'gro kun byang chub mchog / rin chen
T02D1298:196a-31: gling du myur 'gro shog / dpal dgyes pa'i rdo
T02D1298:196a-32: rje'i gtor ma'i cho ga'i rim pa /
T02D1298:196a-33: slob dpon chen po aa la la badzras mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D1298:196a-35: // / pandi ta kastha pa ga th'a ga ya dha ra dang /
